articles.author: Justin Curto
articles.title: Luke Bell, Country Singer, Dead at 32 After Going Missing - Vulture
articles.description: Luke Bell, a neo-traditional country singer, was found dead on August 26 in Tucson, Arizona, after going missing on August 20. His friend Matt Kinman said he had recently changed his bipolar medication.
articles.content: Luke Bell, a neo-traditional-country singer-songwriter who was well respected in the country community, was found dead on August 26 after going missing days before, Today reported. He was 32. Bell wa… [+1590 chars]
